item.title: Arthur Hayes joked about appointing Tom Lee as the head of the Ethereum Foundation
item.description: On August 12th, Arthur Hayes, the co-founder of BitMEX, playfully proposed on social media, "Why not simply have Tom Lee, the newly appointed Chairman of BitMine, directly serve as the head of the Ethereum Foundation? Who is in favor?"Previously reported, BitMine achieved several significant milestones within five weeks: not only establishing the world's largest reserve of ETH but also rising to become the third-largest cryptocurrency holder in the world with an astonishing $49.8 billion in encrypted assets, second only to Microstrategy and Mara Blockchain.

item.title: Argentinian Ethereum developer Fede's intern has decided to donate $500,000 for Tornado Cash's co-founder's legal defense
item.description: On August 12th, as per The Block, the Argentine blockchain developer "Fede's intern" was briefly taken into custody by the police upon entering Turkey. He has now been released and returned to Europe. He indicated that the incident originated from a case brought against him by the Turkish Minister of Interior, alleging that he had assisted others in misusing Ethereum in relation to a certain privacy protocol.The developer mentioned that his trip was to promote a DeFi project and a wine export partnership. He emphasized that his team's previous research on Tornado Cash only encompassed de-anonymization analysis and they never engaged in any illegal activities."Fede's intern" stated that he has made a decision to donate $500,000 to the legal defense of Tornado Cash co-founder Roman Storm.

item.title: Uniswap has generated $3.27 million in revenue in the past 24 hours, ranking third on the crypto revenue leaderboard
item.description: On August 12th, according to data from DefiLlama, Uniswap's revenue in the past 24 hours reached as high as $3.27 million, ranking third on the crypto revenue list, only behind Tether and Circle.Previously, it was reported that the Uniswap Foundation proposed a "DUNA DAO" structure to pave the way for the fee switch.

item.title: Bybit Launches Eight New Tokens on Web3, Supports Direct Trading with USDT, USDC, SOL, and BBSOL
item.description: August 12th. Bybit announced that its novel Web3 platform has been launched, and it now offers 8 new tokens. These tokens include: Ava AI (AVA), TROLL (TROLL), The Spirit of Gambling (Tokabu), Housecoin (House), the unstable coin (USDUC), Uranus (URANUS), PYTHIA (PYTHIA), and the Illusion of Life (SPARK).Users are able to directly purchase and trade these tokens by using USDT, USDC, SOL, and BBSOL from the Bybit Unified Trade Account (UTA). There is no need for an external wallet or Gas token. The new assets can be viewed and sold in the App's "Trade/Web3" section or on the web page's "Holdings" section. The proceeds will be automatically settled to the UTA.Bybit stated that this action is intended to further reduce the entry barrier for users to enter the Web3 space, making on-chain trading and DeFi participation more convenient and secure.

item.title: Metaplanet Invests $61.4 Million to Increase its Bitcoin Holdings to 518 BTC
item.description: On August 12th, according to official channels, Metaplanet announced an investment of $61.4 million with the aim of increasing its BTC holdings by 518 coins.

item.title: Ark Invest increased its holdings of Block stock yesterday, bringing the total value to $19.2 million.
item.description: On August 12th, as reported by The Block, Cathie Wood-led Ark Invest has made changes to its holdings in crypto-related stocks. It has once again purchased a total of $19.2 million worth of Block company stock through its three exchange-traded funds (ETFs). According to Rockflow data, this transaction took place when Block's stock price dropped by 0.49% on Monday and closed at $73.03, which was the lowest closing price since July 18th.

item.title: OpenAI CEO Taunts Elon Musk: Hopes to Launch Counter Investigation into Musk's Influence on X
item.description: August 12th: In response to Musk's threat of taking legal action against Apple, Sam Altman, the CEO of OpenAI, retweeted Musk's post on X and said: "I have heard someone alleging that Musk is manipulating X to seek personal and corporate gains and harming his competitors and those he dislikes. This allegation is astonishing. I hope someone will conduct a counter-investigation into this. Many of us are eager to know what actually happened. Nevertheless, OpenAI will concentrate on creating excellent products."Altman also retweeted a 2023 media article which stated that Musk had pressured the Twitter team to significantly enhance the weighting of his tweets. (Financial Times)

item.title: Ethereum Reclaims $4300 as It Prepares for a New All-Time High Push, Needs About 13% More Gains
item.description: On August 12th, according to HTX market data, Ethereum has reverted to $4300. It is currently trading at $4308, showing a 0.03% increase in the past 24 hours. It still needs to rise by approximately 13% to break its all-time high of $4868.

item.title: If Ethereum breaks above $4400, the mainstream CEX total short liquidation volume will reach $1.495 billion
item.description: On August 12th, according to Coinglass data, if Ethereum manages to break through $4400, the cumulative short liquidation intensity on mainstream CEXs will amount to $1.495 billion.Conversely, if Ethereum drops below $4200, the cumulative long liquidation intensity on mainstream CEXs will reach $335 million.BlockBeats Notes: The liquidation chart does not provide the exact number of contracts to be liquidated or the precise value of contracts to be liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to neighboring liquidation clusters, that is, intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart shows to what extent the target price will be influenced when it reaches a particular level. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that when the price reaches that level, there will be a more intense reaction due to a surge in liquidity.

item.title: Yesterday, the net inflow of the US Ethereum Spot ETF surpassed $1 billion, setting a new historical record
item.description: On August 12th, yesterday the net inflow of the US Ethereum spot ETF reached 10.1962 billion US dollars. This is the highest inflow amount since its establishment, and it is the first time that the inflow has exceeded 1 billion US dollars. The specific inflow of each ETF is as follows:· ETHA (BlackRock): 640.68 million US dollars;· FETH (Fidelity): 276.9 million US dollars;· ETHW (Bitwise): 4.3 million US dollars;· CETH (21Shares): 3.86 million US dollars;· QETH (Invesco): 0 US dollars;· EZET (Franklin): 4.88 million US dollars;· ETHV (Van Eck): 9.42 million US dollars;· ETHE (Grayscale): 13.01 million US dollars;· ETH (Grayscale mini): 66.57 million US dollars.
